projects.name: Student Study Portal
projects.description: Created a comprehensive student study portal using React JS and Firebase, featuring a Notes app, Todo app, and a study material section where students can upload notes in PDF or PPT format, showcasing proficiency in web development with user-centric functionality. Implemented user authentication with secure signup and login processes and created an engaging user experience with About Us and Contact Us pages. Enabled real-time data storage and synchronization with Firebase, ensuring a reliable and efficient platform.

projects.name: Movie Ticket Booking Application
projects.description: Developed an online movie ticket booking application using React JS and Firebase, allowing users to select shows, book seats, and access Contact Us and About Us pages. Implemented secure login and logout functionality and integrated Razor pay for payment processing, ensuring a seamless user experience. Designed a responsive website for smooth usability across devices.

experiences.description: Completed internship at CELEBAL Technologies in ReactJS domain. Prepared a Ticket Booking Application using React JS, Firebase and Razor pay. Assigned weekly tasks that I consistently complete on time.
